Reviews.Title: “Hotel promise fulfilled...offers a very clean, comfortable hotel room!”
Reviews.Author: like2travelusa
Reviews.Content: Promise fulfilled -- Hotel promise FROM Hampton Inn Indianapolis Northwest - Park 100 website (on http://hamptoninn.hilton.com/) in the Hotel Accommodations tab, guest rooms: "Our promise to you includes a clean, comfortable hotel room. In fact, we have 110 of them! If you're traveling with your family, you may opt for a room with two beds. Or, if you're here by yourself on business, why not book a room with a plush, king-sized bed so you can stretch out and relax?" Pros: - Very clean, spacious, comfortable, and quiet hotel room. - Staff very helpful and friendly. Housekeeping does an exceptional job at keeping the lobby, breakfast area, corridors, pool area, fitness center, business center, and hotel room clean. - Very clean pool and hot tub. - High ceiling and shower head in hotel room bathroom. - Complimentary hot breakfast with many options. Breakfast area is well kept, even with a lot of guests. - Located close to I-465. - Complimentary guest washer and dryer (an unheard of pleasant surprise to me even though I did not use the laundry facility -- located by ice and soda machines). Cons: - Hotel room’s thick end cap decor curtains are fixed towards the right and left sides of window so could not move to keep out most of the outdoor light from the well lit parking lot and early morning sunrise. Please note hotel room also has a white curtain that is closer to the window which did cover the whole window for privacy but was sheer so some light still came into the room with all the hotel room lights off. - For all of the amenities this hotel has to offer I would of liked a mini refrigerator in my room. From http://hamptoninn.hilton.com room pictures it looks like the hotel suites have refrigerators, but not regular guest rooms. Overall, a great hotel in Indy and one of the cleanest hotels I have stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “Will Be Back”
Reviews.Author: yuliechristina
Reviews.Content: Highlights: nice breakfast, great pool, cleanliness, comfort, and good location.

Reviews.Title: “Best of everything.”
Reviews.Author: TNtravelers03
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just returned home from a six day stay in the Hampton Inn NW - Park 100 and had the best stay ever in Indianapolis. This hotel is head and sholders above the rest. We have paid a lot more for a lot less and are making this Hampton Inn our new home away from home. We will be staying here from now on. The pool and hot tub area are very clean, large with a great shower and plenty of extra towels. Large room with internet. Breakfast was a great plus. Had lot's to pick from with a large area to eat in. The best this hotel offers is the staff. Go out of their way to help. From the cleaning staff, the breakfast staff, front desk and management was just wonderful. Even offered to help load auto on way home.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: BR2412
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this hotel twice in the past two months. The rooms are spacious and very clean, the staff is helpful and the price was very reasonable. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Very Comfortable and Nice Hotel - seems to be new.”
Reviews.Author: LesleyLane
Reviews.Content: The rooms were spacious, clean and well appointed. The hotel appears to be fairly new. Biggest drawback - no fridge or microwave in the regular rooms (don't know about the upgraded rooms). There is some sort of a reception (no alcohol). But it doesn't appear to be every night. I was not told of the reception at check-in. Free internet. No Coke products on site. The remote does have a sleep timer. All in all, very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay...”
Reviews.Author: Redreb
Reviews.Content: Had the pleasure of visiting this hotel 2x. Once this summer and once 2 years ago. Each time the rooms have been quite clean and the facilities as well. It is quite close to I-465 and has easy access. The staff is quite friendly and accommodating. The pool and hot tub were also quite clean and enjoyable. Enjoyed my brief stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pickylady35
Reviews.Content: I drove across country east to west coast and stayed at quite a number of hotels along the way. I always research where I am going to stay via trip advisor. This was my first stop. As soon as I walked in the door the lobby had a beautiful aroma and was very clean. The young lady at front desk was friendly, helpful and professional. She did everything with a beautiful smile. Keys were ready to go and check in less than 5 min. free parking also a plus. Got to the room. As soon as we entered you could tell the place was immaculate. it smelled very nice, floors shiny, bathroom all clean. wonderful. Clean, clean, clean! When I come into a room I check bathroom, strip bed, check mattress, check air-condition/heater, closet etc. All was in good order. one of the best hotels during my trip. No restaurant buit small store for snacks and water. Water was cheap, I was surprised. We asked about places to eat and was given several places. We selected one from list and it was very good. Free business Center also a plus. Overall nice hotel. I hope they keep this hotel nice. Free Business center with printer (check) Clean and beautifully appointed room (check) Free Wi-Fi in room (check) Nice, welcoming and professional staff in all areas--front desk (check) Free tea, coffee and fresh cookies (check). Parking no charge (check) Free Hot Breakfast (check) Appeared to be safe area (check) Close to stores and restaurants (check) Close to highway (check) 5 stars

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: cpaynej
Reviews.Content: The hotel looks recently updated and is furnished nicely and is very clean. The staff is friendly and helpful. The fitness room was excellent. The complimentary breakfast buffet was hot and fresh with lots of choices. All in all, not a thing to complain about, a very good experience, a very nice hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best staff in Indy”
Reviews.Author: TNtravelers03
Reviews.Content: Stayed several nights and will only stay at this location in the future. It is centrally located for our activites and it's not but a couple years old, clean, excellent breakfast, staff - from floor mopers, cook, front desk on up to management. Just a super nice stay. We've stayed at higher priced and lower priced hotels in Indy and like the three bears, find this hotel just right.....

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service!”
Reviews.Author: iz1927
Reviews.Content: The staff is outstanding. The hotel is well kept both inside and outside. Room was perfect for our needs. We were there for the Brickyard 400. Location off of I65 and to the Speedway is great. We will be staying here again next year for the race.

Reviews.Title: “So impressed!”
Reviews.Author: UKCatGirl_11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, along with our 2 boys & my parents recently stayed at this Hampton Inn location (7/23). We truly cannot say enough good things about our experience. The staff was very accommodating and courteous; rooms were immaculate. We found out how truly wonderful the staff was when we returned home to realize our 4 yr old son's "lovey" did not make it home. This blanket had traveled with him from Guatemala as a baby & has rarely left his clutches. I immediately called the hotel Sunday evening (7/24) asking if my son's blanket was placed in the lost and found, the attendant checked and returned with a "no" but assured me that they would continue to look. I then explained how important this blanket was and why, the Attendant was very kind and again told me they check everything and everywhere. Monday afternoon, after running an errand, I returned home to find a message on our answering machine from an Attendant with the Hampton letting me know the lovey had been found & wanted to verify my address. I immediately called and by tonight (7/27) my son's lovey was back in his cute little clutches. The staff, from the front desk, to housekeeping went above and beyond for my little boy. We are so appreciative and our son is sleeping Peacefully. Our only complaints, if they would actually qualify as that, were; the water in the pool was too cold for my oldest son to enjoy. The rooms were small & the crib, which turned out to be a pack n' play was a bit flimsy. With that being said, these issues would not keep us from recommending, or staying there again. A truly, well ran hotel with a professional staff!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel of the trip! Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Minnesnowtah
Reviews.Content: My family and I just got back from a two week road trip, which mostly centered around Sleep Inns. This was the best hotel we stayed at by far! It was clean. The staff was extremely friendly (greeted us and checked in on us when we walked by). The room was very clean. The TV was huge and very nice. One thing that should not have made me as excited as it did was the fact that they had shampoo and conditioner (two separate bottles). They even had a cute little lap desk for us. The beds were comfortable. The only bad thing I can think of, which is being nitpicky, is that, unlike advertised, you don't have a choice between soft and firm pillows but rather soft and so-soft-there's-nothing-in-here pillows. That being said, although I am a fan of firm pillows, the bed was so comfortable that I was able to still get a good night's sleep. The thing that really sold me on the hotel was the breakfast. I've said it in several reviews now, and I'll say it again - what really matters to me when booking a hotel is the breakfast. It was the best, most delicious hotel breakfast I have ever had the joy of feasting on. They offered sausage, tater tots, scrambled eggs, waffles, bagels and peanut butter, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, assorted fruits, along with more juice options than usual - cranberry (!), apple and orange juice. If you are staying in Indianapolis, I would recommend this hotel hands down. You definitely won't eat better anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL!!”
Reviews.Author: daveNkelly
Reviews.Content: Beautiful exterior and interior, friendly staff, roomy suites, reasonable prices, light traffic in the immediate area, great location right off I-65 (perfect if you are headed to the Children's Museum).... There was a Steak N Shake and Hardees very near the hotel, but we had to drive to another exit to find anything else. All in all, WE LOVED IT!!

Reviews.Title: “They went above and beyond!”
Reviews.Author: JNC25
Reviews.Content: I live in southern Indiana and had decided to stay overnight after being in Atlanta for the previous week. I have stayed at this Hampton Inn location before so I was not surprised to find the staff so nice and welcoming. I was surprised though to walk into my room and find rose petals on the floor and bed as well as a beautiful table setting with champagne, champagne glasses and a framed note from my boyfriend PROPOSING to me! After the initial shock wore off, I learned that Kelly and her staff were responsible for helping him pull this off. I have to say, I was very touched by this. It isn't often that one finds people willing to go outside their "job duties" and Kelly and her staff did just this and did it very well! I can't thank them enough! I will, for sure, continue to stay there when I am in Indianapolis! Oh, and I said "yes"! :)

Reviews.Title: “We'll Definitely Be Back!”
Reviews.Author: BNJ235
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at this hotel! Kelly, the general manager, was extremely helpful and friendly from the moment we walked into the hotel to check in until the last day of our stay, and Cindy, the lady in charge of the kitchen/breakfast area, was also very pleasant and accommodating during our entire stay. Both ladies regularly offered suggestions on which attractions to visit during our stay and Kelly even pulled out a map and showed us the ins & outs of how to get to our areas of interest downtown and exactly where to park. The staff seemed genuinely interested in how we were enjoying our vacation in Indy as well as how we were enjoying our stay at their hotel. And the location of this hotel is perfect - it's located in a quiet, clean area with several nice corporate office buildings nearby as well as restaurants and freeway access very close - it's only about a 10 minute drive from the hotel to Indy's beautiful downtown area. A really nice touch offered by this hotel is "breakfast bags" containing water, fruit, muffin, and cereal bar for guests to take with them when they leave the hotel in the mornings. They also have nice complimentary informal dinner receptions for guests. We'll definitely be back to Indianapolis and won't stay anywhere except this hotel! NOTE: A previous review posted by EBMDD is extremely inaccurate and misrepresents this hotel - that review states this hotel is located in an industrial area with nothing open nearby after dark. This hotel is ABSOLUTELY NOT located in an industrial area and there are plenty of locations from which to grab a quality bite to eat that are well within close proximity to the hotel (Bob Evans restaurant is just one example)! When I read that review before our trip to Indy, I feared that this hotel was surrounded by factories with polluted smoke billowing from huge smokestacks, etc. This is not at all an accurate description of the area surrounding this hotel. Rather, as I stated in my review above, this hotel is located in a very nice corporate business park type of area with many nice corporate office buildings as well as restaurants & freeway access nearby. After staying at this hotel, I won't stay anywhere else when I travel to Indianapolis!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: vette07
Reviews.Content: We were here for the Indy 500. The staff couldn't been kinder to us. Thanks to Cindy the breakfast was different each day & delicious. A snack dinner was fixed for several nights while we were staying there. On the night before the Indy a bag was left for us to take to the race. It was filled with water, chips, & snack bars. What a great surprise! The room was very clean & the staff could not have been nicer. We would highly recommend this great hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Service!”
Reviews.Author: fraziercam
Reviews.Content: Upon arriving at the Indianapolis airport for my flight back home, I realized that I had left my Kindle in the room. I called, and the person who was working the front desk personally took the time to retrieve the Kindle, right then and there. She took my address and the Kindle arrived four days later, excellently-packed and fully-insured. They refused my offer to pay for the shipping. I was, and remain, very impressed with this level of service.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for Butler Parents!!”
Reviews.Author: redding679
Reviews.Content: Great, Clean Hotel! My wife hates to travel fearing hotels experiences, she has named this hotel the best we've ever stayed at. We were in Indy for our Daughter's recital at Butler and loved this hotel. We will be staying again for her graduation! Hotel seems brand new although it is several years old now. Convenient drive to Butler University.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Indy! Hands down!”
Reviews.Author: ChadLowe
Reviews.Content: The staff at this hotel are outstanding! I have stayed here numerous times and will continue to make this MY hotel in Indy! Exceptional service everytime! I can always expect to have a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, terrible location”
Reviews.Author: EBMDD
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is clean and fairly new. Pool is small but decent. Room came with two queen beds instead of the doubles you find in a lot of hotels now. There is free internet and free breakfast. The room did not, however, have a mini-fridge or microwave or in-room safe. The parking lot was very well lit at night, which is great. But the location is terrible. It is just off I-465 at 71st/73rd in an industrial area. After the businesses close for the night, the area is secluded. You have to drive miles to "nearby" restaurants unless you want fast food. Closest shopping was also miles away. This hotel is fine if you have to stay in this particular area, but for leisure stays, I would definitely choose a different hotel in a better location.

Reviews.Title: “Best night of sleep at a motel in years!”
Reviews.Author: MollyPunch
Reviews.Content: This hotel was absolutely wonderful. We stayed here during the Moto GP races and were completely pleased. Location is easy to get to from the track and the rooms are what you find in hotels which are much pricier. Can't wait to stay here next August.

Reviews.Title: “Great place. Very friendly and helpful...”
Reviews.Author: Bentgrass
Reviews.Content: Great place. Very friendly and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay!”
Reviews.Author: FindYourPassion
Reviews.Content: Nice new hotel in a business park type setting which was very quiet in the evening. Parking lot was well lit and surrounding area felt safe. No complaints at all - room was clean, beds comfortable, complimentary breakfast, coffee available throughout the day. Staff was excellent. Would highly recommend and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, comfortable rooms, good service”
Reviews.Author: Soundgoddess
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Indianapolis for a meeting at the 3M EAR facility. The hotel was very accomodating to all of the international guests that accompanied me. While the hotel is totally non smoking (a bit of a problem for the smokers in the group), the staff was very helpful in changing rooms so that the people that do smoke were able to have rooms on the first floor. The hotel was very clean, so compliments to the cleaning staff and the breakfast was nice (food offered was hot and filled frequently so there was a nice selection available during the entire breakfast time).

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: ButlerMom
Reviews.Content: This Hampton Inn was a great value and met all of our expectations. It was close to our destination, Butler University, and offered a Butler University discount. There were many restaurants nearby. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was extremely helpful. The complimentary breakfast was good. The pool and free WiFi were a hit with my son. The whole experience was very enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: “Hampton's are great value, great service, this one proves it again.”
Reviews.Author: VP-CMG
Reviews.Content: A newer Hampton, offering the best of what the Hampton model is built around!

Reviews.Title: “Modern Comfort at Great Price”
Reviews.Author: canecrk
Reviews.Content: Excellent location with many restaurants within a 5 minute drive. Friendly staff and great rooms make your stay comfortable. Front desk staff is extremely friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: ncocacola
Reviews.Content: My mother and I were in town for a funeral. This Hampton Inn was in a nice central location with easy access to the highways. The neighborhood was safe with lots of nearby conveniences. The room was spotless and comfortable. We were able to get a good night's sleep during a stressful time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: NJTravelers1
Reviews.Content: Clean & comfort room, excellent morning buffet. No outside noise, comfortable night of rest.

Reviews.Title: “A Nice, Typical Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: DaylilyFan
Reviews.Content: The staff is eager to please, and everything was immaculately clean. The decor, rooms, bedding, and breakfast are typical of the newer Hampton Inns. (I personally prefer the Holiday Inn Express breakfast because I have a weakness for cinnamon rolls.) There's a pool, hot tub, fitness room, and business center with two computers. We had a little trouble getting our room temperature right and the fan kept reverting to auto from high. I don't understand the lack of an exhaust fan in the bathroom, but the closet hangers are very good. The intersection with I-465 has been expanded and 73rd street is now one-way, which the mapping services haven't caught up with yet.

HotelInfo.Name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis Northwest - Park 100
HotelInfo.Address: 5860 West 73rd Street, Indianapolis, IN 46278
